metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7713 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
OpenStack Compute (Nova) before 2014.2.4 (juno) and 2015.1.x before 2015.1.2 (kilo) do not properly apply security group changes, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended restriction by leveraging an instance that was running when the change was made.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7713` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nova-ajax-console-proxy - 2:12.0.0-0ubuntu2
nova-api - 2:12.0.0-0ubuntu2
